wikipedia_page.main: Kenny Thomson (born 9 November 1951) is a Scottish former footballer, who played for Dunfermline, Alloa Athletic, St Johnstone and Cowdenbeath. He achieved one of the highest total of Scottish league appearances: 654, between 1970 and 1992.

response: * Kenny Thomson (born 1951), Scottish footballer (Dunfermline Athletic, St. Johnstone)
* Kenny Thomson (curler) (born 1969), New Zealand curling player
